mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule (schedule_id, visit_cycle, visit_type, visit_state, staff_id, user_id, order_id) VALUES (#{scheduleId}, #{visitCycle}, #{visitType}, #{visitState}, #{staffId}, #{userId}, #{orderId})
mapper.delete: delete from schedule where order_detail_id = #{orderDetailId} and staff_id =#{staffId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule (schedule_id, visit_cycle, visit_type, visit_state, staff_id, order_id, user_id, order_detail_id,return_id) VALUES (#{scheduleId}, #{visitCycle}, #{visitType}, #{visitState}, #{staffId}, #{orderId}, #{userId}, #{orderDetailId},#{returnId})
mapper.select: select r.return_id AS "returnId" from return r join order_detail od on od.order_detail_id = r.order_detail_id where r.order_detail_id=#{orderDetailId}
